ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: No indeed! He has not done what He ordered him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But no. He has not fulfilled what was enjoined on him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Nay, but man did not fulfil what Allah had enjoined upon him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Certainly, he has not duly fulfilled His commands.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Not one – he has not yet completed what he was commanded.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nay, but has not done what He commanded him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nay; but he has not done what He bade him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: No indeed! Man has not accomplished His bidding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nay, but (man) hath not done what He commanded him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Yet man declines to do His bidding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: By no means He performed not that which He had commanded him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: No indeed! He has not yet carried out what He has commanded him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: By no means hath he fulfilled what Allah hath commanded him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nay, but (man) has not done what He commanded him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, he has not fulfilled that which He has ordered him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But no, he did not fulfill what He has commanded him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: No! Man has not yet accomplished what He commanded him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [80:23] No indeed! Verily, he has not accomplished, he has not done, what He, his Lord, commanded him, to [do].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nay) truly, O Muhammad, (but (man) hath not done what He commanded him) of profession of Allah's divine Oneness and other things.
